mapper.insert: /* ProdSaleDayStoreMomsMapper.getDivisionExcelDownloadSaveInsert */ INSERT INTO TB_CM_DOWNLOAD_LIMIT_CHECK ( ORGN_CD, SEQ, PROC_DT, USER_ID, DOWNLOAD_FG, RESRCE_CD, RESRCE_NM, DOWNLOAD_USE_FG, DOWNLOAD_START_DT, DOWNLOAD_FILE_COUNT, DOWNLOAD_EXPECTED_END_DT, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID, DOWNLOAD_DT ) VALUES ( #{orgnCd}, #{seq}, #{regDt}, #{userId}, #{downloadFg}, #{resrceCd}, #{resrceNm}, #{downloadUseFg}, #{regDt}, #{downloadFileCount}, #{downloadExpectedEndDt}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId}, #{regDt} )
